body: I ate. an Entire bag of spicy queso popcorners and they were GOOD AS FUCK but also I'm not supposed to be the feedee in this relationship (nonexistent) and I should really work out. I'm trying to exercise my wrists since that might help me with rock climbing!
headcanon: fat women will like you even if you don't have a good personality if you can do so much as lift them
literally if you're gonna :eggplant: you HAVE to follow this guide, masturbation is literally physical meditation and spiritual connection with The Girl on Your Screen

header: I have fallen in love with Korone Inugami
body:
Because I always fail to make an OC I like, I've decided I'd rather draw preexisting characters. Specifically, I want to hyperfixate on Korone, because I love her (design yup)!!

DON'T TOUCH HER she's literally MY waifu >:(

headcanon she thinks she's still a size women's small

I'm designing this site off tumblr blogs since... I want a place to blog but prefer websites tbh. This is like my personal journal that you just so happen to be reading.

Uh, the post dates represent the time I first made that post, but I like optimizing things so I may rewrite posts after I've made them idfk
